## Reducer interface

Represents an object used to modify state on a specified action. Provided with token [STORE\_REDUCERS](./state-management.store_reducers.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Reducer<TState, TAction extends StateAction> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [reducerFn](./state-management.reducer.reducerfn.md) | [ReducerFn](./state-management.reducerfn.md)<!-- -->&lt;TState, TAction&gt; | The reducerFn that should be triggered on specified action. |
|  [type](./state-management.reducer.type.md) | TAction\['type'\] | The action that triggers the reducer. |
